# harness_platform_workspaces (Data Source)

Data source for listing workspaces.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harness_platform_workspaces" "all" {
  org_id     = "org_id"
  project_id = "project_id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org_id` (String) Organization Identifier
- `project_id` (String) Project Identifier

### Optional

- `search_term` (String) Filter results by partial name match when listing workspaces.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `identifiers` (List of String) List of workspace identifiers matching the filters.
- `workspaces` (List of Object) List of workspaces matching the filters. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--workspaces))

<a id="nestedatt--workspaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `workspaces`

Read-Only:

- `account_id` (String)
- `created` (Number)
- `description` (String)
- `identifier` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `org_id` (String)
- `project_id` (String)
- `status` (String)
- `updated` (Number)
